channel.title: BBMIP:5
channel.description: We left off last week with some changes to UC. When you get to map C there is a frozen area. This like all the other labs got a make over. The first picture is from the mod release. All the cabinets in this lab were replaced like before. Also the window frames were replaced and match all 15 of the others in AM/UC. The large white tank props in there also got a texture cleanup and all the pipes on it were redone.The next section will go into detail about a specific area and the prop modeling and texturing for it. ![2014-03-24_00004.jpg|690x500](upload://boEHI57ToeGnmPDItuthaSRK8Dr.jpeg) ![Untitled_3.jpg|690x500](upload://gGGDB3xiyqaHfvcu6sRmVIoQlSf.jpeg) ![221140_screenshots_2014-01-11_00004.jpg|690x500](upload://anFw7QQ4roD5j9mPfND1fbT1Wqo.jpeg) ![2014-03-24_00002.jpg|690x500](upload://fQZJcjkziNhbxQIQfghKLnHGqL4.jpeg) ![2014-03-25_00002.jpg|690x500](upload://ihuRE8jxcLmCrfOXYL3Aogg7Etz.jpeg)

item.title: BBMIP:5
item.dc:creator: Cpl.1nsane
item.description:
Deathmonkey7:

I’m glad some efforts are being made to make this area a little more clear. The first time I played this area I had no idea what relation the valves had to the frozen door, and I spent quite some time trying to figure it out.

Great work bk!

It became apparent to me after watching many playthroughs of that section that the puzzle wasn’t as clear to players as I had hoped. With the help of one of our other texture/model artists I had some signs and a few bits made to hopefully make the whole puzzle clearer.

Perhaps I shall write something up about it in more detail at some point.

Read full topic
